But kids’ cartoons are just the beginning. As video generation improves, all video content will shift from manual production to being personalized and generated. Our long-term goal is to build the AI Netflix: a platform where shows and movies aren’t recommended, but instead generated around each viewer’s interests and habits.

We’re 19 year old CS dropouts who’ve known each other since elementary school and won 4 hackathons at 15. After seeing AI flood the internet with low-quality content, we created Pixley – a safe, personalized way for kids to turn their ideas into animated stories.
one_liner: The first platform where parents & kids can co-create AI cartoon shows

name: Leadbay
long_description:
Leadbay (YC F25) discovers and qualifies SMB leads that couldn't be found before. Small-to-enterprise teams use us to prospect the most low-data-low-signals industries like construction, hospitality, even startups.

Co-founders are Milan Stankovic (CTO) - PhD to make AI work with limited data, and Ludovic Granger (CEO). 

Try us on leadbay.ai.
one_liner: Discover and qualify SMB leads that couldn't be found before.

name: Nucleo
long_description:
We help oncologists and radiologists extract insights from CT scans to support tumor characterization and treatment.

The hospitals we work with include Stanford Hospital, Cedars-Sinai (the largest hospital in California), UCI Health, and Weill Cornell.
one_liner: The first Agentic platform for Oncology

name: Tornyol
long_description: Tornyol builds micro-drones that kill mosquitoes. We use smartphone microphones, car park assist sensors and some clever DSP and control to transform 40-gram toy drones into mosquito killers. Because these drones are so cheap and fast, we will lower the cost of mosquito control by 100x which will enable the eradication of mosquitoes from cities, saving more than a million people each year from Malaria, West Nile, Dengue, etc.
one_liner: We build micro-drones that kill mosquitoes.

name: s2.dev
long_description:
S2 is a serverless datastore for real-time, streaming data.

The more we worked on data systems, the more we felt like there was a missing building block. The seamless experience of object storage simply did not exist for durable streams – so we set out to fix that!

S2 reimagines streams as an unlimited and access-controlled web resource. Like if Kafka and S3 had a baby.

- Building agents? Use granular streams to persist context in real time, make workflows auditable, and coordinate between agents.

- Publishing fast-moving data? Streams support high fanout and can be accessed directly over the internet, so they are a great fit for broadcasting real-time feeds.

- Sandboxing? Emit to per-instance streams, and read history or live events just as easily.

- Local-first and multiplayer experiences? Propagate updates reliably and efficiently.

Stop dealing with clusters, and start streaming.
one_liner: API for unlimited, durable, real-time streams

name: Patent Watch
long_description:
We automate patent infringement detection. Our software interprets patents, identifies competing products, and generates claim charts showing who’s infringing and how.

Teams use us to:

- Find licensing and litigation targets
- Send cease-and-desist letters
- Find counter litigation
- Sell IP in wind-downs
- Accelerate M&A diligence

We also run AI invalidity and prior-art searches to help your patents hold up in court.

Companies spend up to $50k to file and maintain a single patent over its lifetime, but once it's granted, they let it collect dust. With Patent Watch, you can start turning your patent portfolio into revenue in 10 minutes.
one_liner: AI for detecting patent infringements

name: Anto Biosciences
long_description:
Anto is building a foundation model for microbial communities, making the gut microbiome computable for the first time. We predict drug toxicity and efficacy across diverse populations and fix drugs so they work for everyone — solving the hidden root cause of most drug failures. 

Founded by Arvid (Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard; Nature-published researcher who pioneered quality-aware, goal-directed sparsification) and David (Harvard Medical School Gastroenterology, J&J), second-time founders who published the breakthrough at leading machine learning AI conferences and Nature.
one_liner: A Foundation Model for Microbial Communities.

name: Imagine AI
long_description:
Imagine AI clones you, not just your voice. We build you online with high-fidelity personas that replicate how you think, write, and sell - so our AI can handle your entire B2B content pipeline: posts, strategic comments, blogs and content engineering to achieve content-market fit.

For B2B service firms and YC companies, this means turning founders' expertise into a pipeline-generating machine. Instead of executives spending 8+ hours a week trying to create content, our forward-deployed content engineers perform deep research to understand who you are -> your voice, your clients' pain points, your unique insights -> then ship and optimize content that books meetings at named accounts.

Our second-time founding team includes Sky Yang (raised $150M as UCSD's youngest Student Body President) and Neo Lee (a Berkeley Math/AI researcher who dropped out to build this). 

We launched in November, now serve 40+ paying customers (Series-A,B and seed stage companies plus VCs, global franchises, and ghostwriting agencies). Achieving minimum 30%-70% week to week growth.

💡 Results:
$20 M+ total revenue generated across clients
$5 M deal closed from a single LinkedIn post
$40 K inbound revenue in 1.5 weeks for one client
200+ qualified inbounds in 1 month after hitting content-market fit

We’re not just another AI tool.

We’re forward-deployed content engineers, building the content OS for every LinkedIn-native B2B company.

📅 Book a demo: https://calendar.notion.so/meet/skyyang333/ghost

🔗 Connect with Sky: https://www.linkedin.com/in/skyyang/
one_liner: Your AI Clone for B2B Content

name: Expected Parrot
long_description: Expected Parrot helps companies simulate their customers with AI agents to explore pricing, product, marketing, communications and other scenarios at scale. Our open-source library and no-code web app let you design custom agent personas and conduct interviews and surveys with them using LLMs of your choice to generate results and reports. Everything is cached and reproducible, and you can send the same surveys to human respondents to validate results in the same interface.
one_liner: Simulate your customers with AI agents

name: Everest
long_description:
Outsourced IT is a $350B industry running on 10-20% margins. We're building AI employees to help them solve support tickets faster and increase margins to 70-80%. 

Yolanda worked as a Senior Support Engineer at Netflix. Her team ran 3x more efficiently than average outsourced IT companies. We're now bringing the automation Netflix has to 150K companies globally.
one_liner: AI employees for outsourced IT

name: Scott AI
long_description:
Scott AI is the agentic workspace where teams align on spec before any codegen runs.

Teams already use multiple coding agents to build. Different coding agents will continue to evolve and have diverse strengths. An engineer will entrust a long-running agent to add dark-mode end-to-end while they pair carefully with an IDE-based agent to land a critical DB migration. These execution agents cannot be the decision layer because they are biased to their own tool, they are not neutral. Scott AI is the neutral, agent agnostic decision layer for the age of multi agent building. Teams will use Scott as their decision workspace to finally ditch google docs and notion as their primary spec alignment layer.
one_liner: Agentic Workspace for Engineering Team Alignment

name: Aside
long_description:
Aside listens to your sales calls and surfaces real-time answers pulled from your docs, HubSpot, or past calls. It's like pressing 𝚌𝚝𝚛𝚕+𝚟 on your company’s knowledge into every rep – so anyone can sound like your best rep.

- 🔎 Shows answers from your docs, Slack, and past winning calls
- 📝 Live coaching that catches what reps miss: Aside spots what reps skip during calls and guides every rep to apply your playbook - BANT, SPICED, or your own - not after, live.
- 💬 Preload your cheatsheets as Live Cards: Turn your playbooks, FAQs, and notes into instant, in-call cards.
- 🎓 Coaching feedback, remembered by AI: Aside reviews every call, gives feedback, and turns it into live suggestions for your next one - so you never repeat the same mistake.
one_liner: Live answer copilot for enterprise tech sales

name: HireGlide
long_description: Hireglide is an AI screening tool for hiring teams. Instead of wading through 500 CVs, we screen them and surface the best candidates. In future, with access to millions of CVs, we will match candidates with relevant roles.
one_liner: AI screening and matching for hiring teams

name: Zalos
long_description:
*Eliminate your Finance Operations grunt work!*
⚡Computer Agent logs into existing systems (e.g., ERP, Accounting, other CFO systems)
⚡Automates Finance processes (e.g., pricing, billing, month-end)
⚡Uploads & submits in your system (e.g., create journal entry)

*The Blockers ➜ Your Finance Systems:*
Finance Operations is buried in repetitive tasks, driving:
❌ Lack finance visibility for decision-making
❌ Wasted time by in-house or outsourced teams
❌ Mistakes and delays from human-driven processes

Barriers to FinOps automation have included:
🚨 Legacy ERPs with limited AI
🚨 Authentication-protected websites & portals
🚨 Too many Finance Systems that lack full integrations

It doesn’t have to be this way.

⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻
*The Breakthrough ➜ Zalos:*

Zalos Agents run your rule-based processes, using your existing Finance applications:
⭐ Our agents automate processes based on simple instructions (e.g., Screen Recording, PDFs)
⭐ Native handling of ERPs or other applications (e.g., 2FA, Captcha)
⭐ Superior performance from our FinOps libraries (e.g., Data Extraction & Harmonization, Reconciliation, etc.)

Customer story:
FROM: In the Bay area, a Finance Manager was wasting 8 days (!) per month:
✖️ Downloads transactions from Corporate Credit Cards & legacy Banks
✖️ Uploads into NetSuite and manually categorizes 100s of transactions

USING ZALOS: Finance Manager schedules ‘run process’ weekly:
✔️ Zalos handles 2FA to download & submit required transactions
✔️ Zalos operates NetSuite to categorize >60% outstanding transactions

*

No browser required: Zalos works silently in the background, whilst continuously improving itself. 

Gaining 2 days per week was transformational. The Finance Manager could
🟪 Reduce financial risks with closer inspection (e.g., debt covenants) 
🟪 Catch cash leakages by spotting suppliers being paid at generous terms
🟪 Be a strategic partner to the CEO & business with better analysis

⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻⸻
Zalos transforms your Finance Operations:
☑️ Scale without headcount - don’t let Operations teams be a bottleneck
☑️ Smarter every day, with evals & RL-finetuning driving a self-performing system
☑️ Built for Enterprise-grade security and screen records every automation for audit

➡Interested? Request demo here: https://www.zalos.ai/contact-us
one_liner: Computer Agents for Finance tasks like reconciliation, in your system!

name: Sourcebot
long_description:
Sourcebot is an open source code understanding platform for massive codebases. We’re used by thousands of engineers in some of the largest companies in the world, including NVIDIA, Red Hat, Wikimedia, and Arista Networks.

Understanding code, not writing it, is the primary bottleneck for large engineering teams. For developers, this means onboarding onto complex codebases faster. For AI agents, it means getting the necessary code context to minimize hallucinations and maximize cohesion within the wider codebase.

Sourcebot solves this by giving developers and AI agents the ability to regex search across millions of lines of code instantly, as well as ask questions across thousands of repos using any flagship reasoning model. Being open source and on-prem, we can get deployed in enterprises within minutes before other tools even get approval.

We met a decade ago at McGill University and have been building together full time for over 2 years. We’ve personally felt the pain of understanding large codebases while working at Microsoft, EA, Ubisoft, Google, and Meta.
one_liner: Helping humans and AI agents understand massive codebases

name: Spatial AI
long_description: Building the data infrastructure for robots. Large-scale, real-world data is the missing ingredient for general-purpose embodied agents.
one_liner: Data for robot foundational models

name: Lua Global Inc
long_description:
Lua is the mid-market agent platform.

We deliver enterprise reliability with the speed, flexibility, and economics that mid-market companies demand - helping them deploy AI agents that drive sales, support, and operations across everyday channels and tools.

We scale through developer agencies and channel partners, enabling rapid distribution without a large enterprise sales motion or scaled forward deployed teams. We think of Lua as an agentOS that abstracts all of the complexity required to launch enterprise grade agents and combine it with the tools needed for these agents to succeed in the real world.

Lua was founded by Lorcan O Cathain (CEO) and Stefan Kruger (CTO)- experienced founders who have spent 15 - 20 years each scaling technology companies across emerging markets.

We sell to mid-market enterprises and developer agencies in the US and internationally. Developers are increasingly our primary ICP but we run SMB & enterprise sales motions to accelerate our learnings and further develop our product:
- SMB ($25- 1k per month): fully automated self-serve agents that handle sales and support for eCommerce companies, hotels, restaurants and general service businesses. If you’ve been on our website you’ve likely seen this.
- Enterprise: We directly sell to mid-market (~ $50M- $1BN) businesses across the US and internationally to eat our own dog food and strengthen our platform.
one_liner: The mid-market agent platform

name: Crunched
long_description:
Crunched is the Excel AI analyst for power users - in consulting, investment banking, and private equity. It error-checks workbooks end-to-end, builds models from scratch, and handles grunt work like extracting and linking data from IMs to template models - all within Excel so teams can review and iterate as usual.

Agents struggle with tabular data - getting reliable, multi-step execution over thousands of interlinked formulas, sheets, and ranges is hard. Making Crunched good enough for people who live in Excel means knowing the pain points deeply.

Michael and Philip has 10,000+ hours in Excel across consulting and finance. Markus and Lars bring deep expertise in scaling AI and enterprise solutions.

We've had easy access to first customers and are already live with firms across six European countries - we now plan to expand into the US. With >1bn total Excel users, we focus on the top 2%, highest-value Excel users globally. 

We're solving one pain point at a time to create a product that doesn't just look good in a demo but actually works in production.

Excel is here to stay, but the way experts model is fundamentally changing - with Crunched.
one_liner: Excel AI analyst for Power Users

name: Narrative
long_description: Narrative automates the creation and distribution of high-quality sports highlight videos for broadcasters, teams, and leagues.
one_liner: AI-Powered Sports Highlights

name: Primer
long_description: Primer is an AI agent that sells, onboards, and supports users automatically through live, personalized walkthroughs.
one_liner: AI Product Demos

name: Specific
long_description: Specific lets users build and deploy backends without code. They simply connect their preferred coding agent and we build, deploy and scale a backend for any project automatically.
one_liner: Build and deploy production-ready backends without code

name: Automax.ai
long_description: Automax.ai does property appraisals faster and more transparent. Our mobile app uses LiDAR and computer vision to capture property details automatically, and our custom-trained AI agents combine that data with all the analysis and aggregation required to to generate a complete appraisal report in minutes. The result is a clear, grounded valuation, fully Fannie Mae & Freddie Mac compliant — done in under 20 minutes from start to finish.
one_liner: AI native real-estate appraisal firm
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Clad Labs
long_description: free codegen from brainrot workflows in your IDE.
one_liner: the brainrot ide

name: Absurd
long_description:
Absurd makes AI brand and performance ads at scale. Our last video for Kalshi ("Election Day") did 1M+ views, and we average 300K+ organic views across all videos. 

Our clients also include Replit, Brex, Whop, Reforge, Gumloop, Micro1, and a couple YC and HF0 startups. 

We do this with a multi-agent orchestration layer to create production-quality videos in 72 hours. These agents collaborate with your team to plan and generate every scene on an interactive canvas. From the canvas, your team can watch shot renders come to life in real time — commenting, iterating, or generating new ideas alongside the agents.

Try it today at absurd.com
one_liner: AI Brand and Performance Ads at Scale

name: Kalpa Labs
long_description: We're building the next frontier of speech models. Generalist speech models that unlock in-context learning & strong instruction following for speech models alongside unifying existing speech capabilities like speech to text, text to speech, voice cloning, etc.
one_liner: Scaling Generalist Speech models

name: Metorial
long_description: Metorial is the infra layer for AI integrations. We built the only serverless MCP runtime that can maintain state with sub-second cold starts, built-in security, and monitoring. We make it easy for developers to connect AI agents to apps and data sources at scale.
one_liner: The infra layer for AI integrations.

name: Arcten
long_description: Arcten enables companies to embed AI copilots directly into their applications so users can accomplish complex workflows through natural language. You can add AI copilots to your product in minutes, connect them to your company’s information, and track how they’re performing -- all in one place.
one_liner: We make any product AI-native in an afternoon

name: Denki
long_description:
Automate internal auditing (planning, testing, documenting) to comply better with financial regulations.

Denki performs audit work with 99% software, 1% services:

✔️ Works on existing systems (e.g. Auditboard, Workiva, ERPs)
✔️ Automates Control processes (e.g. collects evidence, runs walkthrough interviews, tests)
✔️ Records every step for traceability (workpapers w/ full audit trace)

Focused on SOX programs and financial regulations (SEC Rules etc.)
one_liner: The full-stack AI financial audit firm

name: Waffer
long_description: Video creation is stuck between uncontrollable AI generators and complex pro tools. Waffer lets you produce and direct animated graphics videos with the ease of a text prompt, while offering the same amount of control as Adobe After Effects.
one_liner: Lovable for Animated Graphics Videos

name: Sava
long_description: If you are a trusts & estates attorney, RIA, fintech, or family office interested in Sava, reach us at founders@savahq.com
one_liner: Building the future of trusts

name: Icarus
long_description: Always-on intelligence and connectivity for Defense. Icarus builds autonomous, solar-powered aircraft that fly at 60,000 feet for weeks at a time, above the clouds harnessing the power of the Sun, but never too close. It’s the modern-day U-2 spy plane, except each costs $100K and is built by the thousands. The future of warfare is in the Stratosphere.
one_liner: Stratospheric birds for defense

name: Karumi
long_description:
Karumi is an AI agent that joins a live video call with your prospects to deliver personalized product demos, 24/7, in any language.

It bridges the gap between your landing page and your sales team by engaging visitors at the peak of their interest, turning curiosity into conversion. For those not ready to talk to sales but eager to explore, Karumi offers the next generation of interactive, self-guided demos.
one_liner: The Waymo of Personalized demos

name: Mantle
long_description:
Mantle connects to all your tools: your CRM, Mail, Calendar, Payments, Product Analytics, and more. With just one prompt, you can create agents that handle back office work for you.

These agents can automate reports  and email them to you, drafts emails right in your email client, generates pre-meeting research directly in your calendar event, and much more. They run quietly in the background, react to changes in real time, follow a schedule or work when you chat with them. 

You didn’t start up to stay stuck in admin. Turn your company AI-native with Mantle.
one_liner: Build internal agents to automate back office work with one prompt

name: Lemma
long_description:
Lemma enables AI agents to continuously improve from user feedback and production outcomes. Instead of relying on manual prompt tuning and reactive debugging, Lemma detects when an agent’s performance drifts, pinpoints the exact step causing failures, generates optimized prompt candidates, and automatically delivers improvements through our API or by opening a pull request in your codebase. 

Built by ex-AI engineers who felt this pain firsthand, Lemma turns static agents into self-improving systems, helping teams ship reliable AI products faster with compounding performance gains over time. 

Deploy 1x. Learn forever.
one_liner: Continuous learning for AI agents

name: Exonic
long_description:
Exonic is building a global network of intelligence to cure disease.

We are the first drug discovery company open to everyone.

Today drug discovery is siloed - secretive, adversarial institutions in glass towers.

Biological AI is changing the rules. Every day drug discovery becomes more of a computational problem.

Exonic is turning drug discovery into an open, meritocratic tournament.

We are advised by world leaders in bio AI, including the former Head of AI at Ginkgo Bioworks, and the first author of Evo (cover of Science). 

All of the best biological AI models are open source. And on Exonic, you can combine them, prompt them, and share your innovative workflows without writing a single line of code. 

Using Exonic Studio, we just beat a state-of-the-art benchmark in liver cancer (HepG2) synthetic enhancer design, validated in our wet lab.

The platform just went live - you can start right now.

We are turning the internet into a drug discovery powerhouse.
one_liner: Crowdsourcing drug discovery.

name: Jarmin
long_description:
Jarmin.ai is your 24/7 ML eng employee that you hire. Just talk to Jarmin like any other employee and Jarmin handles your AI/ML work from there. Completely hand over full initiatives or individual tasks.

Jarmin’s founding team is from Meta SuperIntelligence Labs (Staff Engineers), Apple (Machine Learning Engineer), AWS (scaling infra), Lockheed-Martin (Research), and JPMorganChase (SWE) with experience building AI/ML and automating complex work of Researchers, Data Scientists, ML Engineers with AI.
one_liner: 24/7 Machine Learning Engineer employees

name: Castari
long_description:
Castari lets developers deploy AI agents in secure, autoscaling sandboxes with one command. We handle tool/MCP connectors, snapshots, and observability so teams go from prototype to production in hours instead of weeks.

Developers focus on building agents, Castari provides the autoscaling sandbox infrastructure to ensure your agents and its tools are secure.
one_liner: Vercel for AI Agents – Deploy sandboxed agents with MCP tools & skills

name: Rovi Health
long_description:
We deliver high-quality, cost-effective healthcare to employees through text. Employers cut 10–20% of healthcare spend. Employees get concierge care that improves outcomes.

Our AI agents analyze clinical data to identify care needs. We treat common conditions through our integrated virtual clinic. For more complex care, our agents find the best in-network providers using millions of price and quality data points, and handle end-to-end appointment booking.
one_liner: AI healthcare concierge for employees

name: Miniswap
long_description:
Miniswap a marketplace for complex hobbies, starting with Warhammer.

In hobbies as complex as Warhammer, finding what you want on general marketplaces is a huge pain. Filters don't work, free-form listings mean that products are regularly misidentified, and piles of counterfeit junk crowd search results. 

Miniswap saves hobbyists from this chaos with its catalogue of more than 20,000 unique miniatures. Sellers match their listings against Miniswap's catalogue giving buyers more information and structure as they shop.

The global market for tabletop games is estimated to be worth $20B in 2025 and Warhammer alone is projected to grow to $3B by 2030. By capturing the market in this untapped niche, Miniswap is strongly positioned to bringing greater transparency, simplicity, and connectivity into adjacent verticals.

Miniswap's founding team merges deep domain knowledge with elite programming expertise and years of experience in business consulting and startups. Co-founders Zak and Will met while studying together at Cambridge, bonded over their love of Warhammer and early modern history. They have been best friends ever since.
one_liner: The Marketplace for Complex Hobbies

name: Freeport Markets
long_description: Freeport is the DeFi brokerage for wealth-oriented investors who want safe yields, no fees, and differentiated investment options. Get exposure to curated onchain enterprises, pre-IPO companies, structured credit, and other alternative digital assets.
one_liner: DeFi Brokerage for Real Assets

name: Boom AI
long_description:
Boom builds the AI employee for e-commerce — an agent that manages every customer interaction across WhatsApp, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and web chat. It answers product questions, supports customers with orders, follows up on abandoned checkouts, restocks, and repeat purchases, and even runs marketing campaigns. Brands simply connect Boom to their store, and their AI agent instantly starts selling, supporting, and following up like a real team member — no setup or flow-building required.

E-commerce is a $6T market where brands spend heavily to bring customers in, only to lose over 99% of them before checkout. Boom fixes that by turning every missed conversation into a sales opportunity. Our clients increase conversion rates and deliver a concierge-like buying experience at scale. We believe that in the near future, every online store will have AI employees managing sales and customer relationships — and Boom is building the platform that makes that possible.
one_liner: AI growth team for e-commerce brands

name: Telemetron
long_description:
Telemetron is an AI-powered support platform tailored for hardware products (medical devices, consumer electronics, industrial hardware, robotics, and more). 

Our platform unifies ticketing, device diagnostics, order tracking, and product documentation into one intelligent system. Our AI agents connect directly to devices, APIs, and backend systems to deliver faster resolutions, smarter routing, and better support experiences.
one_liner: Support and Operations Platform for Hardware Companies

name: The Hog
long_description:
TheHog.ai is the first predictive intelligence engine for growth. We don't just find leads; we predict your next customer before they enter the market.

TheHog.ai maps your ICP, channels, and opportunities across the internet, monitors competitors, communities, keywords, and turns signals into ranked actionable game plans.

The future of sales isn't a static dashboard; it is a living, autonomous command center. TheHog.ai gives a single operator the power of an entire sales and marketing teams by compressing weeks of research into minutes of execution.

The Hog Mind & Global Graph At our core is "The Hog Mind": a proprietary Contributory Global Graph that fuses real-time social listening with advanced identity resolution. Unlike traditional enrichment tools that rely on stale databases, The Hog monitors millions of live conversations across the internet to identify high-frequency intent signals. This creates a self-reinforcing data flywheel that ranks opportunities and triggers autonomous engagement workflows instantly.

What We Do:

Predictive Buying Intelligence: We map the "Global Graph" of customer nodes to surface opportunities before competitors know they exist.

Autonomous Engagement: An army of AI agents that don't just draft, but identify, verify, and engage with customers across LinkedIn, Reddit, and X.

Deep Data Enrichment: We bridge the gap between anonymous social signals and verified contact data, creating a holistic view of your market.

The Data Flywheel: A bottom-up network where every user interaction cleans and verifies our dataset, creating a defensive moat that gets smarter with every query.

The Result: Win your customers before it’s even a competition
one_liner: AI Demand Gen for Companies

name: Lightberry
long_description:
We build brains for robots.

We work with manufacturers like Unitree to make robots listen, speak, and act. You can program your robot out of the box by literally talking to it, no coding involved.

Robots running Lightberry are emotionally intelligent, always on, and fully autonomous. Just like in Star Wars!
one_liner: The social brain for robots.

name: Bluma
long_description:
Bluma is the first AI short form content engine.

In a post-AI world, attention is the most valuable commodity. Social media is only growing faster and faster, and we're still early.

We automate your entire consumer marketing strategy with content templates, generating on brand videos on autopilot.

Everything that a growth team would plan, script, produce, and edit, Bluma automates end-to-end and at scale. We can make entire UGC videos from a reference at 10x the scale and 1/10th of the cost. We remove the operations of hiring, managing, creatives and spend with AI.
one_liner: The new media distribution company

name: Stratus Aviation
long_description:
Airports are among the most data-rich yet information-poor environments in transportation. Thousands of radio transmissions, aircraft movements, and sensor signals occur every second, but these systems remain siloed. Most airfields still rely on manual logs and calls to understand what’s happening on the ground, creating blind spots that slow coordination and limit safety oversight.

The result is a growing safety and efficiency gap. The FAA records four to five runway incursions every day, and over 90% of air traffic control facilities are operating below target staffing levels. Despite $20 billion in modernization programs like NextGen and Safety Management Systems, airports still lack a unified data backbone that connects communication, movement, and intent across the airfield.

Stratus provides the missing layer of intelligence for airport and airside operations — unifying data, communication, and movement into one shared, real-time picture.

For airports, this means faster decisions, clearer accountability, and safer, more efficient operations.
For aviation as a whole, it’s the foundation for connected, data-driven infrastructure that can finally keep pace with modern airside complexity.
one_liner: AI-powered intelligence layer for airports

name: Forge Robotics
long_description:
Forge Robotics is changing the way that metal parts are fabricated. We are enabling a future where our intelligent robotic system completes all steps needed to take raw metal stock and transform it into fully welded parts. 

Beginning with welding, we are building a robot-mounted vision system and AI feature detection that creates a real-time 3D map and tells the arm exactly where to go at every instant.
one_liner: A robotics intelligence system for metal fabrication

name: Amera
long_description:
Amera automates claims processing for health insurance payers. We turn messy claim inputs (PDFs, bills, receipts, EDI and non-standard submissions) into structured data that plugs into existing systems. This cuts manual entry and exception handling, speeding up operations and reducing cost.

We are already working with payers / plan administrators representing ~100k members, giving them access to more affordable care options.
one_liner: Automating claims processing workflows for health insurance payers.

name: DiligenceSquared
long_description:
DiligenceSquared delivers AI-powered market due diligence for investment decisions - like the $500k McKinsey reports, but automated, auditable, and at a fraction of the cost.

When Private Equity funds evaluate deals, they pay firms like McKinsey, BCG, and Bain $500K-$1M for market due diligence. The process takes weeks, and the output is a static PowerPoint that's impossible to audit. A single large-cap PE fund can spend >$30M annually on this and the total market is $10B per year.

Our AI agents conduct expert interviews and synthesize insights with every claim linked to source transcripts. No black box, no "trust me" slides, and no 10x mark-up for human labor.

Frederik bought these reports as a Principal at Blackstone. Soren sold them as a Principal at BCG. Harshil is a repeat founder and former Software Engineer at Google. We've seen both sides and know what matters in due diligence - and now we automate it.

Our clients already include 8 leading private equity funds with over $2.4 trillion in combined AUM.
one_liner: AI-powered market due diligence for investment decisions

name: Velvet
long_description: Velvet is the all-in-one tool for making AI videos. Our team has worked on video generation at Meta FAIR and infra at Adobe, and we’re building the single tool that companies need to produce AI video assets.
one_liner: All-in-one tool for making AI videos

name: Axial Composites Industries
long_description:
At Axial Composites Industries we are building the first non-planar manufacturing cell to manufacture carbon fiber parts at the speed of software for the upcoming autonomous age

We believe in the following:

•	Aerospace and robotics manufacturing is going exponential
•	Thermoplastic composites will be the foundational materials for such applications

Our mission is to equip the West with novel composite manufacturing methods that will act as the backbone of the skyrocketing demand in autonomous systems.

Our method prints stronger and lighter parts by leveraging fiber anisotropy to our advantage. We can manufacture large composite structures in a day rather than weeks. This not only allows for faster iteration cycles, but it unlocks new possibilities for composite manufacturing.
one_liner: Carbon Fiber Manufacturing at the Speed of Software

name: LunaBill
long_description:
LunaBill is building AI Voice callers for healthcare billing teams. Insurance claim follow-up calls account for the 80% of the daily workload of a healthcare billing team, with each call averaging 30 minutes.

Since our launch in July we are now at $764K in contracted ARR, of which $428K is live revenue and the rest will go live by January 2026. Our customers see a 10x increase in claims followed up per biller in the first week and we have converted 100% of pilots to paying customers. We have automated 50,000+ calls and signed partnerships with top healthcare leaders like UC health systems, Mayo, Experian Health and more.

The founders have known each other for over a year. Suhail is a 2x founder, with 3+ years of experience building in healthcare including operating a medical billing company with 200+ healthcare clients. David founded Skiesoft, Taiwan’s biggest healthcare AI scribe company, used by 120k+ healthcare professionals. He also worked as a data scientist at UCSF, building models to audit medical-coding accuracy. Yash was a researcher at various hospital systems including Mayo Clinic.
one_liner: AI Voice callers for healthcare billing teams

name: Claybird
long_description:
Claybird makes studio-quality video ads in under 72 hours for brands like Coca-Cola, Walmart, Eight Sleep, Delve, and Mercor.

Claybird’s AI agents use single-image NeRFs, fine-tuned image editing models, and eval layers for picture-perfect, consistent results at scale.
one_liner: The full-stack AI ad company

name: Fastshot
long_description:
Fastshot is a no-code mobile development platform.
Our mission is to "Democratize mobile app creation with AI"
Anyone can develop a mobile app from idea to App Stores within minutes just by chatting with AI.
one_liner: Lovable for mobile apps

name: Clicks
long_description:
Clicks automates your back-office using your existing tools and processes without requiring any IT integrations.

What We Do:
Think of Clicks as your back-office worker that can handle any repetitive task. Simply describe your process via video call or share documentation, and our forward-deployed engineering team ensures it's automated exactly your way.
Our AI agents work 24/7 and can be kicked-off via email, Slack, or our web app, handling tasks like CRM updates, report generation, and data entry while adapting to your existing software.

Initial Focus:
We're starting with recruiting and executive search firms, automating candidate codification, assessment reports, and administrative workflows that typically consume hours of manual work each day.

Value Proposition:
Our pricing is 100% outcome based: you only pay for the work outputs we complete (e.g., candidates added to CRM, reports generate, etc.). Current customers are already live and saving an average of 60% in costs compared to human workers, with full automation deployed within one week.
one_liner: Computer use agents to automate all back-office work

name: Dome
long_description:
Dome makes it easy to build on prediction markets like Polymarket and Kalshi. We provide the developer infrastructure to access, analyze, and build on prediction markets. 

With our unified API, developers can access live and historical data, including granular datasets not available natively, across multiple platforms at once. Dome makes it simple to trade, embed market data into products, and deploy strategies across multiple platforms through one interface.
one_liner: A unified API for prediction markets, like Kalshi and Polymarket

name: MarkIt
long_description:
MarkIt builds AI agents that work directly inside the workflows trade professionals use every day — Excel, PDFs, broker portals, and more. 
From defensible classification, ACE report audits, and a self-updating system of record, it serves trade professionals end to end with agents intelligent enough to work in the complex environment. 

MarkIt brings reasoning, memory, and automation to global trade compliance, helping Suppliers, Brokers, and OEMs reduce errors, save time, and streamline operations in the growingly intense world of Global Trade.
one_liner: AI Agents for Trade Compliance - Saving Companies from Tariffs

name: Zarna
long_description:
Zarna is private equity’s first AI associate class.

Our agents plug directly into your firm’s data and work like a deal team that never sleeps. Zarna’s agents analyze CIMs, build LBOs, update CRMs, draft IC memos, & act based on decades of proprietary firm knowledge. 

The result: investors spend less time buried in decks and spreadsheets, and more time on judgment, relationships, and winning deals.
one_liner: AI Associates for Private Capital

name: Moss
long_description:
Moss is building the real-time semantic search runtime for conversational and multimodal AI. Our system enables voice agents, copilots, and chat interfaces to retrieve, reason, and respond in sub-10 ms, delivering the responsiveness that makes AI interactions feel truly natural.

If you’ve ever built a conversational or voice AI product, you’ve felt the lag. That moment when an agent pauses and the illusion of intelligence breaks. The bottleneck is almost always retrieval. Each query hops across networks and databases, adding delay and cost. Moss eliminates that gap by keeping retrieval close to where the agent runs.

Moss runs natively across browsers, mobile devices, and servers with an optimized vector index built in Rust and WebAssembly. It enables teams to build AI products that feel instant, contextual, and adaptive. The experiences that sustain engagement and unlock new kinds of interaction. For our customers, this translates into tangible business value: stronger user retention, higher conversion, and entirely new product categories made possible by real-time understanding. Moss is already powering production pilots across voice AI and developer platforms, achieving sub-10 ms retrieval and 70–90% token savings compared to traditional pipelines.
one_liner: Real-time semantic search for Conversational AI

name: Bear
long_description: Bear helps companies capture and convert the highest-intent leads on the internet - visitors clicking from ChatGPT, Perplexity, and other AI agents. Bear owns the entire funnel from agent discovery to conversion.
one_liner: Marketing Stack for AI Agents

name: Fixpoint
long_description:
Fixpoint is Uber for human data annotation. We’re building the network of experts and the platform to automate sourcing, vetting, and deploying them on AI training projects.

It used to be a manual process to staff people on AI training data or eval projects - but Fixpoint leverages AI to staff people and create data better, cheaper, and faster. This includes a network of pre-vetted experts, AI-automated vetting, and annotator management + payroll.
one_liner: Uber for AI trainers and human-in-the-loop supervisors

name: Openroll
long_description:
Openroll is the AI-native operating system for compensation.

Openroll gives companies a single system where compensation finally happens. Offers are sent instantly, budgets stay aligned automatically, promotions stay consistent, and salary decisions are made with confidence. Instead of fragmented tools, spreadsheets, and manual approvals, compensation runs end-to-end in one intelligent system used across the entire organization.

Learn more at https://www.openroll.com
one_liner: AI-Native Workday

name: Rivet
long_description:
Rivet is a visual AI editor for product designers to make UI changes.  Designers ship the changes they make directly to their codebase. 

The most painful problem for designers today is that their vision doesn't match code.  Rivet replaces slow collaboration between designers and engineers by letting designers just do it themselves. Rivet's editor helps turn product designers into design engineers.
 
Design-led companies in YC F25 are Rivet customers.

Learn more at rivet.design
one_liner: Visual editor to design in production code

name: item
long_description:
item connects to all your customer tools, gathers and enriches context automatically, and becomes your company’s source of truth — one place where your team and your AI agents share the full picture to act autonomously.

At the center is the Assistant — your sidekick for daily work. It can send follow-ups, research leads, or add deals with a simple prompt. No complex UI, drop-downs or fields, simply ask.

For repeatable work, you build Agents that you can train like new hires, simply by writing documents that describe your processes. item Agents run business processes across sales, support, and account management autonomously.
one_liner: The AI-Native CRM that works for you

name: Mayflower
long_description: Mayflower is building an AI-powered HR plug-in that automates immigration screening, eligibility checks, and compliance for global candidates. The platform parses documents, classifies visa pathways, and generates attorney-ready forms. By integrating directly with existing HR systems, Mayflower helps companies surface only compliant candidates, reduce legal risk, and streamline the international hiring process.
one_liner: AI plug-in that automates HR immigration screening and compliance

name: Zephyr Fusion
long_description:
Zephyr Fusion is building the first in-orbit fusion power source: a megawatt-class reactor enabling large-scale industry in space, at a fraction of the cost of equivalent solar.

Founded by former physicists from Lawrence Livermore and Oak Ridge National Laboratories, Zephyr leverages decades of fusion research to deliver a compact magnetic confinement system designed to take advantage of the space environment.
one_liner: Powering tomorrow's industrial revolution in space

name: JSX Tool
long_description: JSX Tool is a browser extension that hooks into your React project, so you can easily locate any React component and file with just a click. This gives developers the ability to articulate visual requests to LLMs that without JSX Tool, are either vague or cumbersome to communicate in English and code snippets. On top of that JSX Tool is a full featured IDE tailored specifically for React Development, so users never have to leave the context of their browser when developing React code.
one_liner: AI-First In-Browser IDE for React Development

name: Stormy AI
long_description:
Stormy: AI-Driven Influencer Marketing

Streamline influencer outreach and let your product shine.
	•	Discover: AI pinpoints ideal influencers with 99.8% accuracy.
	•	Outreach: Auto-send personalized emails and follow-ups.
	•	Close: AI negotiates and finalizes deals seamlessly.

Focus on building—Stormy handles distribution on autopilot.

Founders from YC have discount! Please DM me on twitter: @karmedge or email
one_liner: Al platform that makes social marketing as easy as running a Google…

name: Autumn
long_description:
Autumn is open-source infrastructure over Stripe that allows AI startups to build their pricing plans quickly, and flexibly. We act as your app's DB and manage who's paying for what, track usage and manage customer feature access.

YC companies use us because we make it easy to handle common pricing models like usage-based, credits, subscriptions, rollovers and more in 3 functions and no webhooks. 

As you scale, you get reliable billing, that you can change however you want without wrangling code (we handle versioning, migrations etc), and manage custom pricing too. Everything you could down the line (credits, multiple subscription groups, rollovers, referral program, usage analytics, centralized team billing etc), you can drop in at any point.
one_liner: Billing infrastructure for AI

name: Fluidize
long_description: Fluidize accelerates R&D for scientists and engineers by using AI to build and run simulations and experiments. Our platform speeds up development pipelines by automating setup, execution, validation, and scaling, allowing engineers to focus on their science.
one_liner: Helping scientists and engineers run experiments with AI.

name: Ambral
long_description:
We're an AI Account Management army.

Ambral synthesizes signals from all customer activity and interactions into AI-powered models of every account. It pinpoints who needs attention and why, and autonomously takes the best next action to drive expansions, prevent churn, and ensure no customer slips through the cracks. 

Team: 
Sam (CEO): 2x founder. Led AI at Everlywell and early PM at Wonder (now valued at $7bn). Lived the pain of losing customer intimacy at scale and is obsessed with solving it. 

Jack (CTO): Ex-SpaceX Flight Software Special Projects, where he developed telemetry routing and analysis systems for the most complex machines ever created. He’s now doing the same for the complexities of customer relationships.
one_liner: AI Account Managers

name: Wayline
long_description: Wayline is an AI front desk assistant purpose-built for real estate to answer calls and messages 24/7. It’s like an always-on property manager that can convert leads and resolve issues better than any human, day or night. Our AI can be setup in as little as 24 hours and works seamlessly with existing phone/management software. Uniquely, our AI knowledge base is domain-specific to learn and handle the most complex real estate workflows. For property operators, Wayline instantly replaces robo-menus and call centers, while centralizing and scaling back-office teams.
one_liner: AI voice for property managers

name: Serafis
long_description:
Serafis is a search and discovery engine for long-form content. Our AI knowledge graph turns under-indexed data into structured market intelligence — starting with podcasts.

We help investors and operators:
• Accelerate research
• Surface new insights
• Distill signal from noise

We are already live with 12 organizations managing over $70B in capital. Our library features >10,000 curated transcripts featuring top investors, Series A+ founders, and public company CEOs — searchable by person, company or theme.
one_liner: The AI knowledge graph for institutional investors

name: Nixo
long_description: FDE teams manage some of the most complex customer engagements: enterprise onboarding, custom integrations, and high-stakes deployments where precision matters. Nixo defines the new standard of FDEOps -- bringing clarity, automation, and operational precision to every customer engagement. With Nixo, forward-deployed services can finally scale with SaaS-level efficiency and margins.
one_liner: The first ops platform for forward deployed engineers

name: Cactus
long_description: CUDA for phones & consumer hardware: Cactus is used by 3k+ developers and 100+ products to run AI locally on consumer hardware. It is open-source! Check out the repo: https://github.com/cactus-compute/cactus
one_liner: Kernels & Engine for running AI on consumer devices.

name: Synthetic Society
one_liner: Synthetic Users to Simulate Real Users

name: Rid
long_description:
At Rid we're determined to make selling easier than buying. All you have to do is text us what you're selling, and we'll take care of the rest -- researching the product, listing on marketplaces, negotiating with buyers, answering questions, and handling delivery. 

We all have that thing we've been too lazy to sell. Rid makes it so easy we can't even be lazy.
one_liner: Sell with a text.

name: Pingo AI
long_description: Pingo AI is an AI language learning app that helps users build fluency through speaking. It immerses learners in realistic dialogues and personalized lessons with an AI tutor who sounds like a native speaker. Our goal is to make learning languages as simple as daily conversations with Pingo — a companion who understands your goals, remembers your progress, and keeps you motivated.
one_liner: AI companion that helps you learn languages

name: Adaptional
long_description:
Adaptional is the first system of intelligence for insurance. Existing insurance systems organize work. Adaptional AI actually *does* the work.

Our first product Underwriter AI pre processes every submission for an underwriter. AI extracts data from submission files, validates each data point using public sources, and summarizes risk using your underwriting guidelines.
one_liner: AI underwriting for insurance

name: GETASAP
long_description:
Fresh-produce supply chains are built around guesswork. Growers plant without clear demand signals, distributors overbuy to protect against shortages, and retailers end up eating the waste. GETASAP fixes this by rebuilding distribution around real demand and fast execution. We deliver wholesale fresh produce with 8-hour same-day delivery, using micro-fulfillment centers positioned close to demand so we can operate with far less safety stock.

Behind the scenes, we look at live retail sales, purchasing, and waste patterns to decide what to source, where to place inventory, and when to replenish. That lets us buy closer to actual demand, turn inventory faster, and materially reduce spoilage. For retailers, GETASAP replaces procurement teams and fragmented supplier management—we handle sourcing, inventory decisions, and fulfillment end to end as a single, reliable partner. As more volume flows through the network, demand becomes clearer, sourcing gets smarter, and the operation becomes cheaper and more predictable over time.
one_liner: 8-hour fresh produce distribution for Retailers of any size

name: Meteor
long_description:
Meet Meteor: a Chrome-alternative that can actually do your work for you.

With agents getting better by the day (literally), we realize that it’s time to automate the boring, tedious work.

We use your browser session to empower agents to act like your personal assistants (ex. book a calendar, find cheaper flights, buy clothes on amazon etc.)

Some of Meteor’s features:

- Chat with any page
- Integrate with popular apps like Gmail, Google Calendar, Twitter etc.
- Browser agent to autonomously navigate the web and perform tasks
- More coming soon!

We're excited to usher in a new era of browsing.
one_liner: An AI-Native Browser

name: Closera
one_liner: AI employees for commercial real estate

name: Dedalus Labs
long_description: Dedalus Labs is building Vercel for AI Agents. We host MCP servers on our cloud and handle the boring stuff like autoscaling and load balancing so users can go from idea to production in a single click. Our OpenAI-compatible SDK lets users orchestrate complex agentic workflows through one clean API. Route between any LLM provider, connect any MCP tools from our hosted marketplace, and ship in minutes.
one_liner: Connect any LLM to any MCP tools and create complex agents in minutes.

name: Acrely
long_description: Acrely enables enterprises to build and deploy enterprise-grade voice agents. With both cloud and on-prem offerings, Acrely empowers organizations to leverage AI for customer service, sales, operations, and more.
one_liner: Enterprise Voice Agents

name: The Prompting Company
long_description:
The problem:
People are no longer searching on Google. They’re ASKING AI. If your product doesn’t appear in AI answers, you’re dead.

How it works:
1. Find & analyze user questions: We find the exact questions your users ask and check how often your product is mentioned.
2. Create content: We tell you what to post, where to post, and do it for you.
3. Route to AI-optimized page: We redirect AI traffic to AI-optimized page

Offer: Get your free AI visibility report → promptingcompany.com
one_liner: We help products get mentioned in ChatGPT.

name: MangoDesk
long_description:
We help AI teams accelerate the creation of evals and post-training data by creating bespoke data annotation pipelines in seconds and staffing them with the right domain experts.

AGI requires expert-created data and evals across domains, quickly and at volumes. Creating this data reliably is a complex operational challenge. We solve this end-to-end. 

Ankith was previously an engineer at Scale AI where he built the infrastructure for expert sourcing/screening and Gen AI data labeling operations, and Ananth previously founded a software firm with seven-figure revenue and Fortune 500 customers.
one_liner: Simple platform to create data for AI

name: Halluminate
long_description:
We help foundation model labs and enterprises train computer use AI with data and sandboxes.

A knowledge worker spends 90% of their day on a computer. A productive AI agent must similarly learn how to use our computers, browsers, and software to deliver real world value. 

Today, browser and computer use AI is inaccurate, slow, and expensive. Model labs and enterprises who want to improve these agents are bottlenecked by two resources: 

1) High quality datasets for benchmarking and evaluations
2) Realistic sandbox environments for safe and accurate testing/training (ex. a simulated version of Salesforce) 

Halluminate offers a suite of products and services to address both these issues. 

Our evaluation service combines proprietary datasets with high quality annotations to help our customers identify and prioritize the biggest failure modes of their computer- and browser- use AI. 

Our platform provides a catalog of fully managed sandboxes, empowering our customers to safely and accurately test/train at scale, resulting in improved performance. 

Our customers see
- Improved browser- and computer-use agent performance
- New and emergent frontier agent capabilities
- Data driven prioritization leading to exponentially faster development speed
- Increased revenue/sales via marketing from public benchmarks

Our paying customers already include leading computer use model labs and the two largest browser agent companies in the space. 

Wyatt and Jerry are friends that met their first week of school studying CS at Cornell University. They’ve been working and studying together for 7+ years.
one_liner: Data and RL environments to automate knowledge work

name: TraceRoot.AI
long_description: TraceRoot.AI is the first open source AI agent that monitors production environments and automatically fixes bugs. It connects to telemetry data like traces, logs, metrics and repo to analyze and auto-resolve bugs.
one_liner: Open source AI agents auto-fix your production bugs

name: AgentMail
long_description: AgentMail is the email inbox API for AI agents. It gives agents their own email inboxes, like Gmail does for humans.
one_liner: Email Inboxes for AI Agents

name: truthsystems
long_description:
Truth Systems provides a compliance agent to govern the use of generative AI. It translates operational policies into intelligent, real-time guardrails that monitor every AI interaction. This empowers companies to proactively block non-compliant actions and align access to AI tools with user competency. By eliminating the risks and operational blind spots associated with uncontrolled AI adoption, our platform enables enterprises to fully leverage the technology's potential without compromising security. 

We are establishing the new standard for AI governance, building a future where every professional can innovate safely and confidently.
one_liner: Automatically blocking risky behavior with real-time governance agents

name: Blank Bio
long_description:
Blank Bio builds foundation models that understand RNA, the language of life. Our model powers applications across the entire R&D pipeline, from designing better drugs to running smarter clinical trials. 

Our first model is state-of-the-art in mRNA property prediction. It simulates costly experiments, helping partners design more effective mRNA medicines faster and cheaper. Our open-source models are being used by Sanofi & GSK. We’re also collaborating with the Arc Institute to bring our RNA embeddings into the next generation of virtual cell models. 

mRNA design is just the beginning. As the model improves, we’re extending to applications like target ID, novel biomarker discovery, patient stratification, and more. We’ve spent decades applying machine learning to biology across academia (PhDs at the University of Toronto) and industry (Recursion, Deep Genomics, Amazon). 

Contact us to learn more: founders@blank.bio
one_liner: RNA-based AI for better drugs and smarter clinical trials.

name: Gaus
long_description:
Gaus is an AI investment advisor for retail investors.

Founded by Bruno Koba (Nubank, monashees) and Daniel Tulha (Stripe, Robinhood), Gaus gives every active investor an AI investment advisor working around the clock to surface their next great investment. We’re backed by YC (S25).

Retail investors now account for 25% of all U.S. trading volume, nearly double from 2012. But over 56% still say they don’t feel confident in their investment decisions. Gaus fixes that. 

Our AI agents uncover opportunities, decode emerging trends, and deliver analysis tailored to you. Instead of drowning in noise, investors gain a clear edge, shifting from guesswork to confident decision-making.
one_liner: AI advisor for retail investors

name: Lanesurf
long_description:
Lanesurf helps freight brokers book shipments with vetted carriers at the best prices by negotiating rates across multiple calls in parallel.

Our self-improving voice AI stack is built for the messy reality of logistics - noisy calls, compliance checks, constant exceptions and turns them into faster bookings at better margins.

With each booking, the AI learns from aggregated, anonymized lane and pricing data. As more customers use Lanesurf, this learning compounds, driving faster bookings at the best prices and powering a voice-driven freight marketplace.
one_liner: Voice AI for booking freight

name: gitdot
one_liner: A better GItHub

name: Golpo
long_description: The world's best AI video generator that turns your documents and/or prompts into whiteboard explainer videos. In addition, we have a similar product that generates podcast-style audio explainers from your documents/prompts. API access available for both video and conversational audio. Product of Red Tree Inc. Please reach out at founders@golpoai.com
one_liner: Most Powerful AI Video Gen Model for Explainer Videos From Documents

name: Shor
long_description:
Shor is a new Employer-of-Record built from the ground up with AI agents and stablecoins. We enable remote teams to hire and pay global employees at a fraction of the cost. The process is fast, simple, and fully compliant.

Today, global payroll is broken. Payments take days, cost 5–10% in fees, and force companies to navigate complex banking, tax, and labor regulations. Platforms like Deel and Rippling solved this for large enterprises but remain too expensive and cumbersome for the millions of startups and growing remote teams scaling globally.

Shor fixes this by combining autonomous AI agents with stablecoin-based settlement. Our agents handle contracts, worker classification, compliance, and payroll automatically in a simple, messaging-first experience. Payments can settle in seconds rather than weeks at a fraction of the cost of legacy providers.

We are making global payroll fast, affordable, and accessible for the millions of companies left out by legacy platforms.
one_liner: The fastest, most affordable payroll for global teams

name: Ghostship
long_description:
Imagine a QA team of 5,000 testers available 24/7 on every new feature you ship. That's Ghostship. 

Our AI agents will crawl through your product and interact with it like users would to find the bugs (especially edge cases) that lead to churn—all at a fraction of the cost.
one_liner: AI Agents that Find Bugs in Your Product

name: Pond
long_description: We’re building an AI-native messaging app. Pond is a desktop app you can use with your existing messaging services like iMessage (and soon WhatsApp + more). You can see important messages you haven’t replied to, snooze conversations, answer customers in your voice, and more.
one_liner: Superhuman for text messages

name: Liva AI
long_description: Speech and video models trained on internet data still lack realistic and domain-specific results. We solve this by collecting targeted training data for model labs. We hope to create a world where AI feels more human.
one_liner: Audio & Video Data

name: Pharmie AI
long_description:
Pharmie is an AI assistant for pharmacies. It can pick up calls, process prescriptions, handle insurance follow-ups, and even help upsell specific drugs and services. Pharmacies can get 50+ phone calls a day, and missing phone calls means lost revenue from filling prescriptions.

Pharmacy workflows are complex and custom to each pharmacy's needs. Generic tools are not enough, which is why AI agents can handle tasks end-to-end that previously could not be automated. We are constantly evolving Pharmie to become a suite of agents that supercharge your pharmacy.

In the future, pharmacies will evolve into patient care centers, bridging the gaps in access caused by today’s overburdened healthcare system. Successful pharmacies will use AI to optimize their operations, resulting in a higher quality patient experience traditional pharmacies cannot match.
one_liner: The first AI pharmacy technician

name: Verne Robotics
long_description: We build AI models for controlling robot arms, enabling them to learn new skills in just hours. Our robots help businesses cut costs by automating back-of-house tasks with an innovative  pay-by-the-hour business model. Our customers include a biotech unicorn, a leading biotech non-profit, and a direct to consumer apparel brand.
one_liner: AI models that teach robots new skills in hours

name: ZeroEval
long_description:
Our mission is to build self-improving AI agents.

We're here to close the last mile reliability gap. 

Through calibrated llm judges and automatic evaluations, we help companies optimize their agents 10x faster than doing manual experimentation.
one_liner: Auto-optimizer for AI agents

name: ContextFort
long_description:
ContextFort is bringing the power of AI to the three trillion dollar construction industry, starting with an AI co-pilot that reviews every revision of your architectural and structural drawings in minutes—not weeks.

Our Software:
• Detects missing or conflicting dimensions across sheets
• Highlights overlay mismatches between versions
• Checks if an issue is already resolved in the latest set
• Auto-drafts spec-compliant RFIs so you hit “send,” not “type”

Contractors save 2-3 weeks per project, cut costly rework, and keep schedules on track.
one_liner: Helping construction contractors find errors in blueprints

name: datafruit
long_description:
Datafruit is the first agentic DevOps engineer.

It understands your deployment standards, design docs, and DevOps practices, then reasons across them to reduce cloud waste, prevent deployment delays, and eliminate wasted time across the stack. 

Reach out to us: founders@datafruit.dev
one_liner: AI DevOps Engineer

name: Topological
long_description:
Topological is developing physics-based foundation models for CAD optimization. We help hardware teams iterate at the same speed that software teams do. Our technology is accelerating the engineering workflow with AI and scales design and optimization to identify the ideal designs for complex problems given their physical constraints with enhanced speed and performance. 

Our first model, UToP-v1, is a SOTA topology optimization model that understands physics, geometry, and manufacturability. It can generate the most efficient design given a problem’s physical requirements. It has <5% compliance error and is 1930x faster than current methods. We're reimagining mechanical engineering and computational design with precision spatial AI.
one_liner: Physics-based foundation models for CAD optimization.

name: Lark
long_description:
Lark is a modern billing platform with the flexibility to support any pricing model (flat-fee, credit-based, usage-based, hybrid, dimensional, outcome-based, etc.) at any scale. 
Whether you're building an AI powered API service or a B2B SaaS product, Lark provides the tools you need to implement complex billing logic without the hassle. Jack and Vijit previously built a usage-based billing system for a large billing provider.
one_liner: Billing for modern pricing models

name: bitrig
long_description:
Bitrig is the only vibe coder that writes native Swift, which is how the top mobile apps are coded. It's like Lovable for iPhone apps.

Kyle and Jacob are creators of SwiftUI, Apple's UI framework for building modern iOS apps, and led its development for the past 10 years. Tim was co-founder and designer of Storehouse, where he won an Apple Design Award and was later acquired by Square. 

Download bitrig from the App Store:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bitrig/id6747835910
one_liner: Vibe code, test, and deploy Swift apps. All from your iPhone.

name: EffiGov
long_description: EffiGov is building an AI OS for local governments. We've started with AI call operators that answer 311 and departmental lines 24/7 - handling everything from permit applications to animal control.
one_liner: The AI OS for Cities

name: Design Arena
one_liner: World's largest crowdsourced benchmark for AI-generated design

name: Lotas
long_description:
Lotas is building Erdos: a secure, AI-native IDE for data science. Cursor is excellent for software development but it lacks data science-specific tools that are critical to a data scientist’s workflow. Lotas is closing that gap.

For our first product, we built Rao: an AI coding assistant into RStudio — an IDE used by up to 5 million data scientists and statisticians who use the R programming language to analyze data. Rao could read, write, and edit code while understanding the user's context (codebase and environmental variables).
one_liner: Cursor for Data Science — secure, AI-native IDE for data scientists

name: Monarcha
long_description:
Monarcha is an AI-powered geospatial platform built for logistics, real estate, urban planning, and environmental teams. It turns natural language into powerful spatial analysis, styling, and workflows with no GIS expertise required.

Working with geospatial data today is slow, fragmented, and deeply technical. Simple tasks often require desktop based software and coding expertise. Most platforms rely on outdated desktop software, steep learning curves, and disconnected tools. Even simple tasks like uploading data, running a buffer, or visualizing zones can take hours and require specialists.

Monarcha changes that.
We connect directly to your data, enrich it with public datasets, understand spatial context, and let you run 50+ spatial tools instantly on the map. Upload vector or raster files, run PostGIS SQL queries, generate heatmaps, clip zones, and more all with a simple prompt. We're giving everyone the power of advanced spatial analysis to help save time, money and unlock siloed geospatial data across entire organizations. 

Want to learn more? Check out monarcha.ai
one_liner: An expert for your spatial data

name: Overdrive Health
long_description: Overdrive Health offers AI powered medical billing services, helping providers get paid more money in less time. Our technology enables us to provide the best quality insurance and patient billing services for a fraction of the usual cost
one_liner: AI Powered Medical Billing

name: Orange Slice
long_description: Orange Slice is a spreadsheet where every column is TypeScript—and AI writes it for you. Describe what you want in chat ("find the CEO's LinkedIn and get their email"), and we generate the code, create the columns, and run it across thousands of rows. Our fully-typed SDK has 100+ enrichments built in: LinkedIn, contact info, company data, web scraping, AI research. Columns automatically execute in dependency order. No workflow builders—just describe it or code it.
one_liner: Agentic sales enrichment spreadsheet

name: Nuntius
long_description: Applying artificial intelligence to economically productive use-cases requires bulletproof alignment. We’re solving that.
one_liner: Making Models Follow Rules.

name: Wafer
long_description:
Every successful tool is a bet on efficiency. A waterwheel grinds more grain per unit effort than a quern. A transistor switches more operations per watt than a vacuum tube. This is civilization's pattern: do more work with less energy.

For ten thousand years, efficiency meant physical work. Intellectual work rode the surplus. Better farming, manufacturing, transport. But the brain itself bottlenecked every intellectual task.

Compute changes this. For the first time, we can drive efficiency gains in intellectual work directly. Any repeatable job with measurable output has an efficiency ratio. Useful work divided by energy consumed. Intelligence per watt.

Humans perform tasks at some quality-weighted outcomes per kilowatt-hour. AI systems do the same jobs. We can measure both the same way. AI is crossing the human baseline. Domain after domain.

The world's hardest problems are information problems, and human intelligence is no longer the limit. The cost of intelligence per unit of energy is the limit. Every order of magnitude drop in cost expands the set of solvable problems.

Our mission at Wafer is to maximize intelligence per watt by using AI to optimize AI infrastructure, achieving thousands of times better energy and cost efficiency.

We want people to do their life's work here in pursuit of radical abundance. We believe cheap intelligence is the most essential piece of technology for a future of abundance. We will build the future with intelligence "too cheap to meter."
one_liner: AI that makes AI fast

name: Panels
long_description: Panels is an audio data platform that delivers high-quality speech datasets from vetted, diverse contributors to power training and evaluation of foundational voice models.
one_liner: Audio Data for AI Labs

name: Qualify.bot
long_description: Qualify.bot helps commercial lenders and loan brokers process business loan applications with 4x higher conversion rates. Our AI voice calls eliminates 8+ hours of manual work per loan, from lead qualification to document collection & follow-ups.
one_liner: AI phone agents for Commercial Lending

name: Cyberdesk
long_description:
Cyberdesk is the first self learning computer use agent for developers to automate desktop workflows. 

For example, one of our customers is building an AI agent for hospital patient intake, and they’re using us to automate an entire team of people manually clicking and typing into a desktop app to book appointments. 

We launched mid July, and our agent is already operating in production environments, creating appointments in electronic health record apps and processing files in legacy ERPs.

We’ve built the first computer use agent that memorizes tasks and repeats them quickly while still adapting to unexpected changes on the screen. A good analogy is to how humans use computers: once we get used to an app, we use it much faster, while still adapting to random popups and crashes. This new paradigm for computer use will be needed by every company automating human workflows on computers.

Mahmoud previously built robotic process automation solutions impacting 20K+ employees at a Fortune 100 company. He also built AI & ML solutions at Baylor College of Medicine Neuroscience & Texas Children's Hospital + co-published a paper at the Rice Networks Group. 

Alan is ex-NASA and previously dropped out to be the first founding engineer at a PearX startup. He is a second time founder, having previously built and scaled a consumer AI app to thousands of paying users.

Computer-use agents will automate the $6T dollars spent on enterprise knowledge work and Cyberdesk will be the platform to power this.

We’d love to talk with you!
https://cal.com/mahmoud-al-madi-klrs5s/30min
one_liner: Self learning computer use agent for developers

name: Janet AI
long_description:
Janet AI is the AI-first ticket management system, built for modern engineering teams.

Ticket management today is too reliant on manual work. Context gets scattered. Information doesn’t stay-up-to date. Systems get noisy.

We integrate with your information channels (meetings, Slack, Discord, SMS, etc.) to auto-create, update, and organize work items.
one_liner: The AI-Native Jira

name: Lilac
long_description: Lilac taps idle GPUs from cloud providers and enterprises, giving startups and researchers cheaper compute while letting companies monetize unused capacity. Fully automated with Kubernetes integration.
one_liner: Spot GPUs that use idle GPUs from enterprises

name: Imprezia
long_description: The first advertising infrastructure designed specifically for AI apps. Seamlessly integrate contextual brands & products that enhance user experience while generating revenue to pay the inference bills.
one_liner: The World's First AI Ad Network.

name: Alter
long_description:
Alter is a zero-trust identity and access control platform purpose-built for AI agents. It wraps every tool call in strong authentication, fine-grained authorization, and real-time guardrails, so agents can move fast without breaking things.

Each request is verified at the parameter level, authorized against granular policies, executed with least-privilege access, and fully audited in real time. Unsafe actions, whether it’s a rogue DROP TABLE or a payment above policy limits, are blocked before they touch production. Behind the scenes, Alter manages credentials, issuing ephemeral, scope-narrowed access for every interaction, then rotating or expiring it in seconds. The result: no long-lived secrets, no blind spots, and no surprises in audit.

With Alter, teams can move fast on AI agent initiatives while staying fully compliant with SOC 2, HIPAA, GDPR, and internal security standards. A CISO-ready dashboard delivers real-time visibility, detailed audit logs, and compliance-ready controls, removing silos, eliminating excessive permissions, and providing complete oversight of every agent workflow.
one_liner: Secure access control and authorization platform for agent workflows

name: OnDeck AI
long_description:
OnDeck is the infrastructure layer that makes Vision Language Models accessible and scalable for enterprise. We let organizations instantly find any object, behavior or event, in any footage, without needing to train a model or collect any training data.

The Pain: Creating vision models usually takes months: collecting training data, training, then deployment.  Worse yet: 
+ it’s often impossible to get enough data for a specific task, and 
+ even the best cv models struggle to generalize across diverse camera setups, workflows and environments. 

To overcome these blockers, we bet early on the power of VLMs and built a vision engine that can generalize across any task and doesn’t need any training data. We published a NeurIPS workshop paper showing our new methods with VLMs beat traditional CV even at niche tasks.

Our current customers include:
- National Defense Organizations
- Robotics Research
- Security cameras
- Behaviour analysis for port monitoring
- Off-shore oil & gas monitoring
one_liner: Analyze any footage, without training a model

name: Skope
long_description: Skope builds AI for core legal workflows. We will save your law firm time and help you make more money, with AI.
one_liner: Build a more profitable law firm with AI.

name: Frizzle
long_description:
Frizzle uses AI to grade handwritten math assignments for teachers and transform them into rich analytics and differentiated assessment to help personalize instruction for every student. Teachers spend over 10 hours a week or 25% of all their work grading - Frizzle does it in minutes. Frizzle is the most valuable piece of software for teachers ever, as it eliminates the most time-consuming part of their workflow so they can focus on teaching.

Frizzle shifts education from waterfall to agile learning.
